trans-unit.source: ebook-wizard | free and secure e-book drive

By accessing and using ebook-wizard, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not use our service.
Ebook-wizard provides tools for editing and creating eBooks. The platform allows users to format, design, and manage their eBooks.

You are responsible for the content you create or edit using our service. You must ensure that your content does not violate any laws or third-party rights, including copyright laws. Ebook-wizard is not responsible for any content created or edited by users. We reserve the right to remove any content that violates these terms.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information and for all activities that occur under your account.

All content and materials on ebook-wizard are owned by or licensed to us and are protected by intellectual property laws. You may not copy, modify, or distribute any content from our platform without permission.
Ebook-wizard is not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages resulting from the use of our service. We do not guarantee that our service will be uninterrupted or error-free.
We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your access to ebook-wizard at our sole discretion, with or without cause, and with or without notice.
We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Any changes will be posted on our website, and your continued use of the service constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.
These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction where ebook-wizard operates.
For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms of Service, please contact us at contact@ebook-wizard.com.

Please input an ebook you bought or downloaded online.
Accepted formats: MOBI, EPUB, AZW3, PDF, DOCX, HTML, TXT
You can also drop multiple files to import more ebooks at once

If you upload multiple files at once, you won't have control over setting the metadata of each individual ebook. They will be imported using the default settings, and you'll be able swap the cover and metadata later.
Drop ebook file or click to select

You need to provide email address associated with your e-reader.

Not all devices accept all formats.
(e.g. Amazon Kindle only accepts MOBI and AZW3).
means that the file will be converted to the target format

Please wait, the file is being converted...
Securely create and store e-books in the cloud

A free secure network drive that offers the ability to create and convert e-books. With ebook-wizard you can create and store all your e-books in one place. Sign up now to start using the ebook-wizard service.
You don't have an account yet?

E-book wizard offers a lot of functionality to help you manage your e-books. You can store your e-books in one place, convert them to other formats, and share them with other users. If you have an e-book reader (such as a Kindle), you can also synchronize your e-books with your device. Sign up now to start using the ebook-wizard service.
Ebook-wizard supports all popular e-book formats. You can store and convert e-books in formats such as epub, mobi, azw3, pdf, docx, txt, html.
Don't wait and try ebook-wizard now. It doesn't cost you anything, and you will gain access to many features that will help you manage your e-books.
to gain free access to ebook-wizard.
